metadata.title: CVE-2023-52817 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Fix a null pointer access when the smc_rreg pointer is NULL Incertain types of chips, such as VEGA20, reading the amdgpu_regs_smc filecould result in an abnormal null pointer access when the smc_rreg pointeris NULL. Below are the steps to reproduce this issue and the correspondingexception log: 1. Navigate to the directory: /sys/kernel/debug/dri/0 2.Execute command: cat amdgpu_regs_smc 3.
